task.title: Posting a Prose.io Response
task.shortdesc: How to Publish to Github via Prose.io

content.P:
This task will enable you to construct a Github post using Prose.io.
You must have: a github account & access to a internet-connected device

step.cmd: Authorize on Github with your Github account information
Select the responses repository =>select week (ie: week 9)==> select team number (ie: team 4)
Compose post. Use the tools in the bar at the top of the pages to add headings & other stylistic elements.
At the top of the page, give your post a descriptive title. Do not delete the ".md"
Click on the floppy disk icon on the right side of the page to "commit" (post) your work. Add a comment explaining what you've done.
